Module COMP2042.CW.hfyxc3
Package brickdestroyer.model.entities

Interface Entity

All Known Implementing Classes:
Ball, BlackStoneBrick, Brick, CementBrick, ClayBrick, HasteBrick, Player, RubberBall, SteelBrick
public interface Entity
This interface is used to ensure all entities will have the behavior to retrieve the basic properties of each entity's class in the game of Brick Destroyer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    javafx.scene.paint.Color
    getBorderColor()
    Getter method for the border color of the brick.
    double
    getHeight()
    Getter method for the height at the of the entity.

    getInnerColor()
    Getter method for the inner color of the brick.
    double
    getWidth()
    Getter method for the width of the entity.

    Getter method for the upper-left corner x bound of the entity.

    getYPosition()
    Getter method for the upper-left corner y bound of the entity.

  • Method Details

    • getBorderColor

      javafx.scene.paint.Color getBorderColor()
      Getter method for the border color of the brick. It defines the stroke color of the entity in the game window.
      Returns:
      a Color that contains the sRGB value of the border color of the entity.

    • getInnerColor

      javafx.scene.paint.Color getInnerColor()
      Getter method for the inner color of the brick. It defines the fill color of the entity in the game window.
      Returns:
      a Color that contains the sRGB value of the inner color of the entity.

    • getXPosition

      double getXPosition()
      Getter method for the upper-left corner x bound of the entity. It defines the x position starting point of the brick to be generated and drawn in the game window. The value of it can only be positive.
      Returns:
      a Double that contains the x position of the upper-left corner of the entity.

    • getYPosition

      double getYPosition()
      Getter method for the upper-left corner y bound of the entity. It defines the y position starting point of the brick to be generated and drawn in the game window. The value of it can only be positive.
      Returns:
      a Double that contains the y position of the upper-left bound of the entity.

    • getWidth

      double getWidth()
      Getter method for the width of the entity. It defines the brick length in pixels to be drawn on the x plane of the game window. The value of width can only be positive.
      Returns:
      a Double that contains the width of the entity.

    • getHeight

      double getHeight()
      Getter method for the height at the of the entity. It defines the entity length in pixels to be drawn on the y plane of the game window. The value of height can only be positive.
      Returns:
      a Double that contains the height of the entity.
